unitar 0.0.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

build_pep_resource_targets()

Target factory to build targets from a PEP

build_pep_resource_targets_prj()

Target factory to build targets from a PEP

build_pep_resource_targets_prj_old()

Target factory to build targets from a PEP

get_tar_dirs()

Gets a tar_dirs folder from either argument or R option

load_custom()

Helper function to build targets from function calls with custom args

load_custom_old()

Helper function to build targets from function calls with custom args

load_external_file()

Helper function to build target functions to track and read files

my_meta()

Simplified tar_meta function with only a few fields.

peptar_dirs()

Retrieves tar folders from PEP

peptar_exec()

Execute a function across all target folders specified in the current Project.

peptar_load()

Load a target invisibly, from all your PEP target folders

peptar_make()

Execute tar_make across all target folders specified in the current Project.

peptar_meta()

Execute tar_meta across all target folders specified in the current Project.

peptar_path()

Find path to a target from all your PEP target folders

peptar_read()

Load a target and return it, from all your PEP target folders

source_target_functions()

Helper function to load target-creation functions from PEP config

tar_build_from_pep()

Target factory for arbitrary functions on PEP samples

track_external_target()

Experimental target factory to track but not duplicate external files.

unitar

Targets that span projects

unitar_exec()

Execute a function across a list of tar_target folders

unitar_load()

Load targets from a list of possible target repositories

unitar_make()

A global tar_make function that spans all tar_target folders

unitar_meta()

Call tar_meta across multiple tar projects

unitar_path()

Returns the path to the cache of the given target

unitar_read()

Load targets from a list of possible target repositories

unitar_read_from_path()

Reads a target given a direct path, likely output from unitar_path

unitar_read_xprj()

Load targets across projects
